name: Ruler Of Egypt
description:
Ruler of Egypt is the originator of all economy simulation strategic games.

You as the ruler of Egypt will have to manage your kingdom, which initially has 1000 acres, 100 people and 3000 bushels of grain in storage.

You can sell/buy land with neighbouring kingdoms for bushels (the price will vary between 17 and 26 bushels per acre).

You need to feed the people of your ancient kingdom and plant crops for the next year.

Ensure your people don't starve and that you have enough land to grow crops. Beware of unexpected events such as rats destroying grain, plagues and various harvest performance by your people.

Managing just the few resources in this game is not a easy job over decade of your rule.

Ruler of Egypt is a really great, absorbing and fun strategy game.

Are you a despot or the ruler loved by your people?

Accept the challenge and download the game now!
